title: Navaratna Kundan Stud Earrings - A Celestial Symphony of Colors
materials: Diamond accents. Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: Intricately handcrafted Kundan setting showcases the traditional Navaratna arrangement. The gemstones are carefully selected and bezel-set within a lattice of 22K gold, surrounded by dazzling diamond accents. The delicate filigree work on the gold frame adds a touch of old-world charm.
occasions: and as an everyday statement piece. Ideal for gifting at Seemantham or Upanayanam ceremonies. Suitable for both traditional and contemporary outfits.
description: Embrace the auspiciousness of Navaratna gemstones, believed to bring good luck and prosperity. These earrings seamlessly blend traditional Kundan craftsmanship with a modern stud design, making them versatile for various occasions. The Hyderabadi polish ensures enduring brilliance and timeless elegance. The intricate detailing and vibrant gemstone colors make this piece a true work of art.
